sentence: Florida Republican Governor Ron DeSantis has targeted Disney with legislation in recent months after the company opposed what critics dubbed as the "Don't Say Gay" bill.
author: Xander Landen
title: Ron Johnson Takes Heat for Linking School Shootings to 'Wokeness'
